'' It was a nice touch by Allen Iverson to seek out Larry Mack Brown , his coach for the past 3 1/2 seasons. For a player often described as selfish and immature, it was a giant step toward superstardom. It's special, and it's a tribute to my coach and my teammates, said Allen Iverson . ''I've always felt that whether these guys know it or not, kids watch them and want to be like them and today was the greatest thing for basketball,'' Mack Brown said. ''

, Farrington High School officials are disappointed- but not skeptical about the reason- that Michael Vick , here for Sunday's Pro Bowl, canceled a visit to the school that had been set for tomorrow. I have pretty good instincts for this kind of thing, working at a school, said Farrington student-activities coordinator Theresa Ellis . According to sources close to Mike Pence with knowledge of Indiana politics, a number of factors influenced the congressman's decision to forgo a presidential run and instead turn

fight for the homeland. He ''supported creation of the new Department of Homeland Security, the largest reorganization of the government since the beginning of the Cold War.'' Because of the Department of Homeland Security, our ability to defend the homeland is more effective, efficient and organized. Mike Pence is a committed supporter of the bogus war on terror.
